user_description: Be crazy. Be stupid. Be weird. Be whatever. Because life is too short to be anything but happy.
I want the last thing I hear to be you whispering my name.
Grant me the serenity to accept the things i cant change; the courage to change the things i can change; the wisdom to know the difference.

If u want wind, just run! No risk, no glory.
